about_the_game:
The blue hour is a brief period of the day, between sunset and nightfall, when the sky takes on a distinctive deep blue shade. While the soft natural illumination from the sun slowly fades away, city lights spark into life, creating beautiful and unique colors, long appreciated by photographers and painters.

To celebrate its 5th anniversary, Slipstream takes you on a grand tour of the European continent.

5 NEW TRACKS


Lots of new features have been added to the Slipstream engine to make these tracks possible. All set in real world locations, they represent a technical and artistic evolution for the game.
  • Marseille, France
  • Pompeii, Italy
  • Transylvania, Romania
  • Andalucia, Spain
  • Edinburgh, Scotland

3 NEW CARS


The line-up of playable cars gets a substantial upgrade, with 3 brand new models, bringing a more western flavor of automotive design to Slipstream.
  • Wellenreiter
  • Spectre
  • Wildfire

5 NEW SONGS

The soundtrack is also expanded, with 5 exclusive new songs from composer Effoharkay, the author of the Slipstream OST.

GOING BEYOND

More than just additional content, Blue Hour takes Slipstream a step further. It brings into reality things that weren't possible in the original release, due to time constraints and technical limitations. It's a product and a celebration of these five years of continuous work and refinement of the game. A glimpse of a possible future.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything since 2018
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Slipstream: Blue Hour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An European-themed content expansion for Slipstream, including new tracks, cars and music.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Greek, Russian
